entry.title: $2700 // Nicest management i ever met! Call now to view!
entry.content:
3 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Morgan Av, Central Av. Too cheap price? I know, i also can`t understand why it`s so cheap, i would price it at least at 3k. (last year tenant paid $3100)--- Awesome awesome awesome 3 bed in the heart of Bushwick! All great sized bedrooms, central a/c and heat, private balcony attached to one room, laundry in building and nice shared roof! Nicest management i ever met! Located a hop and a skip from both L and JMZ trains. Call now to view! We can help you find roommates on Nooklyn.

Call or text Trish: show contact info

AMENITIES
Central A/C
